column1: Little Goat Diner////Work with me here. The wallpaper is barely Indian. It's almost paisley
column2: but not quite. It must have been inspired by the parathas burrito because they're twinkies. The breakfast burrito has a touch of Indian with the parathas flatbread
column3: but then it's all these crazy things that only a genius would put together. Avocado and beans; okay. Chili sauce
column5: sunny eggs. But then there are these vinaigrettey greens added in and you get all these nutso flavors mixing together for a sweet/sour/spicy/creamy party in each bite from start to finish. The burrito is like the wallpaper - pretty
column7: and sorta Indian. It's quite eclectic. -- I can't wait to try the other vegetarian/pescetarian options!
